COST.TARGET_DETERMINATION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_CREATURE_UNTAPPED ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = (filter:Count()) if total > 1 then return 1 else return 0 end
COST.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil then local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetPlayer( player ) filter:NotTargetted() player:SetTargetCount( 2 ) for i=0,1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_ARTIFACT_TO_TAP" ) end player:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) ) end
COST.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil then for i=0,1 do local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(i) if target_card ~= nil then target_card:Tap() end end end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:Untap() end
